comment: She is an awesome teacher. She is very nice and super clear with her instructions. You have to do short readings out of each book and then discuss it in class. If you show up to class and do the assignments then you will get an easy A. Make sure to put many details any paper you write for her. She likes for her students to write long papers.

Prof. Thomas is so sweet. The class consists of reading the textbook/stories and discussing it in class. I only read about 1/3 of all of the material and still made an A. There are no tests, but she will ask to write down what you read to make sure you understand. Attendance is mandatory because  after x times a letter drops. Would take her again!!

All our assignments are pretty easy, there are no test, but she doesnt seem to grade in any scale. some people said way more then me in class and got a C for participation, when i got an A.  I busted my butt,but missed a few classes due to being sick, & she claimed I missed over the 5 days of class allowed so my hard earned "A" became a "B".

She is a magical unicorn. She cares about her students and what they think. You don't really have any tests, but the assignments are long (even after she shortens them), but they're not difficult. She really values participation and opinions, so speak in class and be respectful and you'll do great. Amazing teacher.
Professor Noelle was very reasonable and cared for her students! She was very encouraging and knowledgeable of her subject.

Awesome teacher.  Really upbeat and helpful. Discussion based class, expects you to be respectful of everyone in class, but students lead discussions.  Learned a lot in this class about how to promote multicultural education and combat racism.  I recommend this class taught by Ms. Thomas.

She was an awesome Professor. She is fairly leniant with due dates, as long as you turned everything in. She genuiely cared about her students. She is a very nice and helpful lady. I would take her again if I could. You will learn much in her class. She likes to incoperate class discussion with lecture material. Take her if you can. It is worth it.

She is a very kind hearted professor. She genuinely cares about her students and their sucess. There are a lot of assignments to turn in, but they are not too difficult. She likes to facilitate group discussions a lot mixed with class lecture. She is somewhat flexible with due dates. We had guest speakers. Her class was never boring, and I learned.
She is the nicest teacher I have ever had. There is a lot of work to do, but it is not hard. Great Class!

Mrs. Thomas is amazing. This was her first time teaching, and she was great. I can only imagine she will be better each semester. Assignments are simple and clear, and she grades fairly. She cares a lot about her students and makes the class about learning, not about hard tests or papers. Take her if at all possible!
